title: Fix conditional workflow branch integration and type hints
description:
QA Review found that conditional workflow implementation exists on 'agent/engineer/task-chain-pl' branch but is not merged to the test branch. Additionally, there are type hint errors and test failures that need to be addressed.

Issues to fix:
1. CRITICAL: Merge commits 7bca481, 8a47658, d768d27, 34ef0c7 from agent/engineer/task-chain-pl
2. MEDIUM: Fix type hints - change 'any' to 'Any' in dag.py lines 26, 53, 71
3. MEDIUM: Ensure all unit tests pass after merge (10 currently failing)
4. LOW: Remove unused imports (Path from conditions.py, Set from dag.py)
5. LOW: Update agent fixture in tests to include WorkflowExecutor

See detailed findings in QA review.
acceptance_criteria: All commits from conditional workflow branch are merged
All 30 unit tests in test_workflow_chain.py pass
WorkflowExecutor is properly initialized in tests

blocking_issues: Implementation not merged to test branch
